Description of incident: Employees of the state of Virginia who are enrolled in the Commonwealth's 2014 Flexible Spending Account had their information exposed.  Conexis erroneously sent summary reports of Blue Cross/Blue Shield Flexible Spending Account Services to 11 state human resources and payroll employees.  The reports included participants from across the state rather than from specific locations related to the human resources and payroll employees' work.  The human resources and payroll employees who received information that was not intended for them signed a certification confirming that they had deleted or destroyed the information.
